.b-weekview .b-dayview-timeaxis-time:nth.title: Custom day duration
.b-weekview .b-dayview-timeaxis-time:nth.content: This demo renders only hours from 4am to 10pm and initially scrolls to 7am through dayStartTime, dayEndTime and visibleStartTime configs

[data-ref=\"coreHoursOverlayDay\"].content: The coreHours config may be set to overlay the day section
